ygData.subject: Re: Hyperneat and competitive coevolution?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Drew, I m not aware of an experiment combining HyperNEAT with competitive coevolution.  It s true that it would be interesting to see it. ken

Hi Drew, I'm not aware of an experiment combining HyperNEAT with competit=
ive coevolution.  It's true that it would be interesting to see it.

ken

-=
-- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Drew Kirkpatrick <drew.kirkpatrick@...> wrote:
=
>
> Just wondering if there has been any work using hyperneat in
> competit=
ive coevolution. It seems like the ability to setup the
> substrate to repr=
esent the geometric relationships of inputs would
> prove beneficial in mor=
e complex competitive coevolutionary problem
> domains.
> 
> I'm not partic=
ularly familiar with hyperneat, and I might just be
> searching for the wro=
ng keywords. Anyone aware of any work in that
> area?
> 
> 
> 
> -Drew
